name: Tori's Nest
description:
Tori's Nest
Tori needs your help to create a safe home for her upcoming bird family!🐣🥚

You can help Tori build her nest by collecting and bringing home twigs until the time runs out!🕊️
Your end score is based on how completed her nest is by the end of the day. The more twigs are brought home, the higher the score and safer the nest is! 🥚

🎮Controls

 Movement
 - 'Spacebar' - take off & fly
 - 'W', 'A', 'S', 'D', - move on the ground
 Any action
 - 'E' or left click  - pick up twigs and deposit them on the nest!

🕊️Gameplay
  1. Bring twigs to the starting place before time runs out.
  2. Pick up twigs using ‘E’ key. You find them scattered on the ground. 
  3. Tori is small, she can only carry 3 twigs at once.
  Don't forget to bring them to her nest!

  

Team:
⌨️ Programming - Spirit (Lorand Kis)
🎨 Art - Fuxia (Gabriela Borta)

🐥 Have fun!
